rooms.description: Spacious entrance with a reception area and foyer incorporating minimalist Brutalist design elements. Natural stone finishes, concrete exposed structures.
rooms.notes: Aligning entrance according to Vastu principles for positive energy flow.

rooms.description: Large living area with open-plan layout, incorporating concrete elements and exposed brickwork. Features a hearth accentuating the Brutalist style.
Dining area with a simple, functional design, complementing the living room. Minimalist furniture and robust concrete finishes.
Efficient kitchen with modern appliances integrated into a Brutalist design using raw materials and concrete detailing.
rooms.notes: Positioned for optimal ventilation and utility access.

rooms.description: Guest bedroom featuring a compact yet functional layout with essential furniture, ensuring privacy.
rooms.notes: Adjacent to main living spaces for convenience.

rooms.description: Dedicated library area with built-in bookshelves and study nook, designed with a blend of industrial concrete finishes and warm lighting.
rooms.notes: Strategically located for a quiet reading environment.

rooms.description: Well-equipped bathroom with practical fixtures, complementing the Brutalist design.

openings.description: Main entrance door designed with a heavy, reinforced steel frame and minimalist design to reflect Brutalist aesthetics.
Large windows providing ample natural light while maintaining the raw concrete aesthetic.
Smaller window section that aids in cross ventilation and adds to the industrial look.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with ample natural light, featuring concrete walls and a minimalist furnishing approach.
rooms.notes: Incorporates a private balcony for relaxation.

rooms.description: Secondary bedroom with functional design, ensuring privacy and comfort.
Additional bedroom designed for utility with a focus on functionality over lavish decor.
Modern bathroom fitted with contemporary fixtures, designed to complement the Brutalist style.
Integrated indoor swimming pool with adjoining lounge area, constructed using reinforced concrete structures and minimalistic design.
